Employer Summary

At Deloitte, we understand that well-being extends beyond physical health. To be our best selves, we need to focus on all aspects of our well-being, including, physical, mental, financial, and social. Thatâ€™s why we empower our people to design and integrate work and life to meet their unique needs no matter where they are on their lifeâ€™s journey.

As well as your basic salary, we offer a number of additional core benefits. These include:

  • Holidays, starting at 25 days a year
  • A flexible contributory pension arrangement with matching contributions
  • Life assurance of six times your core salary (up to a maximum of six times the Earnings Cap, in force at date of death)
  • Occupational sick pay
  • Personal accident insurance
  • Mobile phone is not fully funded but you can claim on expenses for business use.

We understand that different people value different things. Our flexible Options scheme allows you to pick and choose further benefits up to the value of your Options allowance. They include:

  • Up to ten days additional holiday
  • Childcare vouchers: a tax-efficient way to pay for childcare
  • Dental insurance
  • Bikes4Work scheme
  • Give As You Earn: an easy, tax-efficient way to make regular donations to charity
  • Private medical insurance
  • Travel insurance
  • Corporate discounts on benefits: from gym membership and travel to computer hardware and software
  • Critical Illness Insurance
  • Additional Life Assurance
